alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Monroe; Randolph; St. Clair; Washington (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 6:07AM CDT until April 11 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clinton County in south central Illinois... Southeastern Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Washington County in south central Illinois... Northeastern Randolph County in southwestern Illinois... Southeastern St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 607 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Red Bud, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Baldwin around 610 AM CDT. New Athens around 615 AM CDT. Marissa around 620 AM CDT. Tilden around 625 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lively Grove, Okawville and Nashville. This includes Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 34 and 50. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clinton; Monroe; Randolph; St. Clair; Washington
